description:
Secure, Fast & Private Web Browser with Adblocker

The new Brave browser blocks ads and trackers that slow you down and invade your privacy.
Discover a new way of thinking about how the web can work.
- Improved Brave News performance. (#42021)
- Upgraded Chromium to 130.0.6723.116. (#42088) (Changelog for 130.0.6723.116)
